A

AlertSystem - Class in Unnamed Package
Class representing an alert system that can send notifications to users through a specified medium.
AlertSystem() - Constructor for class AlertSystem
 

E

EmailService - Class in Unnamed Package
Concrete implementation of NotificationMedium for email notifications.
EmailService() - Constructor for class EmailService
 

G

getHistory() - Method in class AlertSystem
Retrieves the history of sent notifications.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Main
The main method to demonstrate the functionality of the AlertSystem with different notification mediums (EmailService and SMSService).
Main - Class in Unnamed Package
Main class to demonstrate the use of NotificationMedium interface and its implementations.
Main() - Constructor for class Main
 

N

NotificationMedium - Interface in Unnamed Package
Interface for a notification medium, which can be implemented by various classes to send notifications through different channels (e.g., email, SMS, push notifications).
notifyUser(String) - Method in class AlertSystem
Sends a notification and stores it in the history log.

S

send(String) - Method in class EmailService
Sends a notification message through email.
send(String) - Method in interface NotificationMedium
Sends a notification message through the implemented medium.
send(String) - Method in class SMSService
Sends a notification message through SMS.
setMedium(NotificationMedium) - Method in class AlertSystem
Sets the notification medium for this alert system.
SMSService - Class in Unnamed Package
Concrete implementation of NotificationMedium for sending SMSService
SMSService() - Constructor for class SMSService
